channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Loses It Over Steve Bannon Being Ordered To Report To Prison
item.description: Trump lost it and demanded that the 1/6 Committee be indicted after Steve Bannon was ordered to report to prison.

item.title: Gun-Wielding Illegal Alien Allegedly Shoots Two NYPD Officers in Latest Migrant Crime Incident
item.description: In the early hours of June 3, 2024, NYPD officers Christopher Abreu and Richard Yarusso were investigating a robbery when they encountered 19-year-old Bernardo Castro Mata, an illegal alien from Venezuela, driving a motorized scooter with no plates the wrong way down a street. To read the rest of the article click here The post Gun-Wielding Illegal Alien Allegedly Shoots Two NYPD Officers in Latest Migrant Crime Incident appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Protester Shouts Down Coup Plotter Steve Bannon
item.description: As Steve Bannon ranted outside the courthouse while he tried to avoid prison, a protester told him that his coup failed and he was going to jail.

item.title: Europe May Face a Second Middle Eastern Migrant Crisis
item.description: Europe may once again be about to receive mass waves of migrants from the Middle East, invoking memories of the 2015-2016 period, when then-German Chancellor Angela Merkel invited Syrians (and others) to come to Europe without limitation. To read the rest of the article click here The post Europe May Face a Second Middle Eastern Migrant Crisis appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Pennsylvania House Republicans Boo And Walk Out On Hero 1/6 Cops
item.description: Several Pennsylvania House Republicans booed, walked out on, and disrespected hero 1/6 police officers.

item.title: Baltimore Has an Obvious Problem. The Fix is Fairly Obvious Too.
item.description: “Baltimore County releases illegal immigrants charged with crimes despite federal requests,” declared a recent headline on the local FOX 45 news site. To read the rest of the article click here The post Baltimore Has an Obvious Problem. The Fix is Fairly Obvious Too. appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Biden Releases New Video Of Vets Calls Trump An Unfit Draft Dodger On D-Day Anniversary
item.description: As the world marks the 80th anniversary of D-Day, the Biden campaign has released a new video calling Trump an unfit draft dodger.

item.title: Fairfax County, Virginia: Public Schools, Limited English Proficiency, and the Opportunity Cost of Mass Migration
item.description: In economics, opportunity cost is defined as “the potential benefits that a business, an investor, or an individual consumer misses out on when choosing one alternative over another.” A dollar spent on A cannot be simultaneously spent on B. To read the rest of the article click here The post Fairfax County, Virginia: Public Schools, Limited English Proficiency, and the Opportunity Cost of Mass Migration appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Sean Hannity Couldn’t Save Trump For Disastrous Crash And Burn
item.description: Sean Hannity tried to get Trump to say that he didn't want to use the presidency for revenge, but Trump refused to do it.

item.title: Massachusetts Response to its Migrant Crisis: Offer Even More Benefits
item.description: If any state in America proves the axiom that “things in motion stay in motion” it’s Massachusetts. What else but perpetual motion physics can explain the logic behind the Bay State’s non-stop granting of benefits to illegal aliens? To read the rest of the article click here The post Massachusetts Response to its Migrant Crisis: Offer Even More Benefits appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .
